text: Mulk kī mashriqī sarhad wahāṅ shurū hotī hai jahāṅ Damishq kā ilāqā Haurān ke pahāṛī ilāqe se miltā hai. Wahāṅ se sarhad Dariyā-e-Yardan ke sāth sāth chaltī huī junūb meṅ Bahīrā-e-Rūm ke pās Tamr Shahr tak pahuṅchtī hai. Yoṅ Dariyā-e-Yardan Mulk-e-Isrāīl kī mashriqī sarhad aur Mulk-e-Jiliyād kī maġhribī sarhad hai.
